title: LF Support Duo - Diamond+
body:
Hello friends. I am looking for a support main in either Diamond, Master or high Plat to help me reach Master before the season ends. I've gotten some advice and have decided to try playing ADC to climb since I usually enjoy it and I'm not the worst ADC in the world. If you'd like to go for the final push before the end of the season with me then please add me or post a reply. I have both Teamspeak and Skype but am willing to get Curse Voice. Apart from being high Plat, you must also not be toxic or pessimistic.

**When I Play (times in AEST):**
Monday/Tuesday/Thursday - 1-9 PM
Wednesday - 2:30-9 PM
Friday - 1-2 PM-AM
Saturday - 8-2 AM-AM
Sunday - 8-9 AM-PM

If you're keen on duoing but don't main support you can still add me or post a reply and we can probably go for it. :)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=HKM13I0w,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-04T21:39:32.521+0000)
>
> You streaming yet mate?

Nope, things have come up. I don't know when I'll start streaming. :s The plan was to start over half a year ago.

> [{quoted}](name=Best Burrito AU,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=HKM13I0w,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-11-04T23:26:27.114+0000)
>
> Nope, things have come up. I don't know when I'll start streaming. :s The plan was to start over half a year ago.

Fair enough. good luck finding a partner and getting Master =)

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=HKM13I0w,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-11-04T23:35:50.650+0000)
>
> Fair enough. good luck finding a partner and getting Master =)

Thanks. :)

Sounds like a noble effort. Not sure what time I'll be able to play exactly but I'll gladly take a spot on the bench.

{{champion:223}}
Plat 2 support i should be available at those times as well
